channel.title: Intellectually Dishonest

channel.description: Four dudes from New Orleans discuss the world from their own perspectives.

item.title: Episode 12 - Wahh, Fisherman
item.description: On this episode, we discuss our police experiences, hurricanes, and religion.
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, we discuss our police experiences, hurricanes, and religion.

item.title: Episode 11 - Unpopular Opinions
item.description: On this episode, we discuss things we are hypocrites about, our extreme opinions, and more.
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, we discuss things we are hypocrites about, our extreme opinions, and more.

item.title: Episode 8 - Big Social Media
item.description: We discuss the on going battle that social media takes against free speech
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the on going battle that social media takes against free speech
item.itunes:subtitle: BLOW AFTER BLOW

item.title: Episode 7 - Caleb A Striaght Busta
item.description: The guys get distracted from the topics list and end up spending the session taking shots at each other, instead: Is Jeremy susceptible to bribery? Is Caleb more elitist than Chris? Does Chris blackmail his friends? Have Marc and Caleb come to blows in the past? Lastly, CHRIS FINALLY REVEALS THE G IN MASTER G 1813!
item.itunes:summary: The guys get distracted from the topics list and end up spending the session taking shots at each other, instead: Is Jeremy susceptible to bribery? Is Caleb more elitist than Chris? Does Chris blackmail his friends? Have Marc and Caleb come to blows in the past? Lastly, CHRIS FINALLY REVEALS THE G IN MASTER G 1813!
item.itunes:subtitle: BLOW AFTER BLOW

item.title: Episode 6 - Playing Games in the kitchen
item.description: On this episode, we have on a special guest. We discuss the game mechanics inherent in life, the ideology of Fornight and Call of Duty, changing political opinions, and Chris's vacation over hot sauce. A heads up, sorry for the quality of this and last episode. Everything should be back to normal for the next episode.
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, we have on a special guest. item.itunes:subtitle: We in the kitchen today, bro

item.title: Episode 5 - Where is episode 5?
item.description: On this episode, we get more into the botnet and finances. Sorry for the late update everyone. We promise episode 6 will be a treat!
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, we get more into the botnet and finances. Sorry for the late update everyone. We promise episode 6 will be a treat!

item.title: Episode 2 - Plans are Plans, Buddy
item.description: On this episode, Marc joins the party and we discuss the feedback of the last episode, the big 5 personality test, depression, suicide, and junk cars.

item.title: Episode 1 - Bourgeois Spectacles
item.description: The guys discuss Jeremy’s recent appearance to defend gamers on the news, XXXTentacion’s tragic death and the subsequent social media backlash, Austin’s Bourgeois spectacles, what makes mass murderers and more
